1168 
 
FINE AND APPLIED ART (DOUBLE MAJOR)  
 ADEYEMI        
 AKWANGA            
 ALVAN               
ANKPA    
 ARGUNGU           
Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, 
Mathematics, Fine Arts and any other two (2) 
subjects from:  
1. Craft  
2. Textile Clothing  
3. Technical Drawing  
4. A Science subject  
5. An Arts subject  
6. Decorative Painting  
7. Spray Painting, Lining, Sign and Design  
8. Wall Hanging, Colour Mixing/Matching and  
Glazing  
9. Graphic Design  
10. Graphic Printing  
Fine Arts and any  other two (2) subjects  
  
 
PROGRAMMES/COURSES AVAILABLE AT THE NIGERIA CERTIFICATE IN EDUCATION (NCE) LEVEL AND THE REQUIREMENTS FOR EACH
